archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0507
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an online store manager, I want to be able to configure the auto address picker so that it works for our needs - examples - exclude PO boxes, pull in the postcode, identify hotels etc.

properties.value: Depends on integration with address checker. OOTB we do save previously used adresses, for example in context of a customer

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
